subject: Broken Shifter Spring
description_text:
Hello,

The spring broke on my sequential shifter. Are there replacements available?

Thanks,


Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Roy Schwalbach,  Please provide your order number, contact name, phone number, and address, and we will send you a replacement spring.Â
I am hoping to purchase the spring as I bought the shifter 2nd hand and do not have an order number. Thanks, Get TypeApp for Mobile

Is this a possibility? Thanks, Get TypeApp for Mobile Roy Schwalbach wrote: 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 I am hoping to purchase the spring as I bought the shifter 2nd hand and do not have an order number. Thanks, Get TypeApp for Mobile
